text: On the night of May 27th, 2019, a large and destructive tornado stuck Dayton, Ohio and its surrounding suburbs of Brookville, Trotwood and many others, injuring 166 people and indirectly killing one person. the tornado was the first of two EF4-rated tornadoes to touch down during the larger scale outbreak. It was the first EF4 tornado to strike the state since 2010. ==References==
title: 2019 Dayton tornado
